gaussian() - Static method in class io.github.ethankelly.StdRandom
Returns a random real number from a standard Gaussian distribution.
gaussian(double, double) - Static method in class io.github.ethankelly.StdRandom
Returns a random real number from a Gaussian distribution with mean μ and standard deviation σ.
geometric(double) - Static method in class io.github.ethankelly.StdRandom
Returns a random integer from a geometric distribution with success probability p.
getAdjMatrix() - Method in class io.github.ethankelly.Graph
An adjacency matrix represents a (finite) graph by indicating whether a pair of vertices share an edge between them.
getAgents() - Method in class io.github.ethankelly.Model
We maintain a list of agents, one per vertex, that form the basis of the model.
getGraph() - Method in class io.github.ethankelly.Model
Being a graph (or network) model, we associate each model with a graph object (using the graph class).
getInfected() - Method in class io.github.ethankelly.Model
In order to monitor and analyse the progression of the model, we need to be able to view which vertices are in each state - this method returns the agents currently infected by the contagion.
getNumEdges() - Method in class io.github.ethankelly.Graph

getNumVertices() - Method in class io.github.ethankelly.Model
An important piece of information in the model is the number of vertices in the graph.
getPeril() - Method in class io.github.ethankelly.Agent
An agent's peril rating represents the danger they are currently in.
getProtected() - Method in class io.github.ethankelly.Model
In order to monitor and analyse the progression of the model, we need to be able to view which vertices are in each state - this method returns the currently protected vertices.
getProtection() - Method in class io.github.ethankelly.Agent
The protection rating of an agent is based on a baseline random real number, between 0 and 1, and the peril.
getRecovered() - Method in class io.github.ethankelly.Model
In order to monitor and analyse the progression of the model, we need to be able to view which vertices are in each state - this method returns the agents that are currently recovered from the contagion, allowing us to attribute to them some (potentially zero) increase in protection due to some level of immunity, where appropriate.

getSeed() - Static method in class io.github.ethankelly.StdRandom
 
getState() - Method in class io.github.ethankelly.Agent
Each agent can be in one of a number of states, namely any of those in the State enum.
getSusceptible() - Method in class io.github.ethankelly.Model
Several methods benefit from having access to a List of only the susceptible vertices, such as determining the next defence strategy or which vertices contract the infection in the next time step.
getVertex() - Method in class io.github.ethankelly.Agent
The vertex attribute of an agent indicates their location on the graph that the model uses.
Graph - Class in io.github.ethankelly
A graph is a collection of vertices connected by edges in some configuration.
Graph(int) - Constructor for class io.github.ethankelly.Graph
 
GraphGenerator - Class in io.github.ethankelly
The GraphGenerator class provides several methods for creating various graphs, including Erdos-Renyi random graphs, random bipartite graphs, random k-regular graphs, and random rooted trees.
